name: Stockcars Unleashed
description:
It's your time to shine as you start your career in Stockcars Unleashed and get up the grades from a white roof driver to hopefully European, Scottish and British Champion and then move on to the World Final and take the National Championship.

Unlock Cockpit View and 2 new game modes by completing the game.

Special thank you to the drivers who made this possible also.

Stockcars Unleashed comes on the success of Bangers Unlimited Pro and it's you guys who have made this possible. Keep supporting me and I will keep supplying!
